text: William Grady Little (born March 30, 1950) is a former baseball manager. He was the manager of two Major League Baseball teams. He managed the Boston Red Sox in 2002 and 2003, and the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2006 and 2007. ==Other websites== * Managerial record at Baseball-Reference.com Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Boston Red Sox managers Category:Los Angeles Dodgers
title: Grady Little
